title: PM welcomes President of Cuba’s Prensa Latina news agency
description: Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh on December 1 hosted a reception for Jorge Legañoa Alonso, President of Cuba’s Prensa Latina news agency, who is visiting Vietnam on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of bilateral diplomatic ties.

title: Cuba to announce incentives for foreign investment at FIHAV 2025
description:
HAVANA, Cuba, November 25 (ACN) Important government decisions aimed at fostering business development in Cuba will be announced today during the 8th Investment Forum of the 41st Havana International Fair (FIHAV 2025), which opened at the Expocuba fairgrounds.

title: Cuba-Russia business committee to boost bilateral cooperation
description:
HAVANA, Cuba, November 25 (ACN) At the 41st Havana International Fair, which opened on Monday, a forum of the Cuba-Russia Business Committee identified new opportunities for cooperation to further strengthen economic ties between the two countries.

title: Contours of trade pact with US to be finalised in 2-3 weeks
description:
India has not brought up the issue of reciprocal tariffs in its discussions with the US, and talks are concentrating on the scope of the Bilateral Trade Agreement (BTA) and the ways to increase the bilateral trade to $ 500 billion by 2030.
